# RV-16 Basic D Flip-Flop: Store switch_0(5) when switch_1(6)=1
# Initialize: RAM[1]=0 (latch output), RAM[2]=switch_0 (data)
0000000000000000 0000000000000001 0000000000000000 0000000000000011 # Pass 0 -> RAM[1] (r1=0)
0000000000000000 0000000000000010 0000000000000101 0000000000000011 # Pass switch_0(5) -> RAM[2] (r2)
# Latch: r1 = D when clock=1 (NAND-based)
0000000000000001 0000000000000011 0000000000000010 0000000000000110 # NAND r2(2), switch_1(6) -> RAM[3] (temp)
0000000000000001 0000000000000001 0000000000000011 0000000000000010 # NAND r3(3), r2(2) -> RAM[1] (r1)
# Store r1 to RAM[100], output to tape
0000000000000011 0000000001100100 0000000000000001 0000000000000000 # STORE r1 -> RAM[100]
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0000000001100100 0000000000000011 # Pass RAM[100] to tape
